package.name: epson_spelp_driver

description.p: ROS-Industrial nodes for interfacing with Epson robot controllers.
This package is part of the ROS-Industrial program and contains nodes for interfacing with Epson industrial robot controllers that support the SPEL+ programming environment.

package.author: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
